snippet.title: Elegos Game Dev Live - Music with Matt 2
snippet.description:
If you want to hear more of my music - check out www.mattjavanshir.co.uk - thanks for watching!

Want to overthrow the sovereignty or work to stand with them? Decide for yourself in Elegos, an immersive first-person RPG where every action matters. Designed with a flexible play system, forge a path through a world where complex political forces clash in any way you like. A game built to be moddable from the get go, you can tweak and change however you like.

► WISHLIST ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/18...
► JOIN OUR DISCORD: https://discord.gg/WRU9pYdVzW
► FIND MODS: https://www.nexusmods.com/elegos

FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE
---------------------------------------------------
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/elegosgame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/elegosgame/
Developed by Perpetual Games Ltd
© Perpetual Games, 2022
